name: heremap
description: node/browser interface to HERE Maps REST API

scripts.docs: jsdoc2md   --template README.hbs --param-list-format list  --files heremap.js common.js map.js geocoding.js routing.js cluster.js    > README.md
scripts.build: browserify  -r heremap.js  common.js routing.js geocoding.js cluster.js  -s heremap | uglifyjs -c -o dist/heremap.min.js
scripts.builddebug: browserify  -r heremap.js  common.js map.js routing.js geocoding.js  cluster.js -s heremap -d -o dist/heremap.min.js
scripts.here: uglifyjs lib/mapsjs-core.js lib/mapsjs-service.js lib/mapsjs-mapevents.js lib/mapsjs-ui.js lib/mapsjs-clustering.js  -c --source-map -o dist/libhere.min.js

author: devbab
